data.questText: I've finally found this hero the Leo are so worked up over. He's taken up residence down south, near the lake, but I managed to sneak a waystone anchor inside his royal hall. Just step through the portal and put an end to him.
data.completeText: Nice work. The Crocuta are already increasing their attacks against the disorganized Leos. It should keep them occupied for a little while. But it's only a matter of time until one of them, Leo or Crocuta, gets delusions of grandeur again. I doubt this is the last time we'll have to break up one of these cults.
